title: Pillow cover
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Geometric star and leaf forms embroidered in red, white and buff silk on heavy blue ground. Motifs have saw-tooth edges, and contain smaller motifs reserved in blue linen.
